Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Ibis Styles Tours sud - formerly Novotel in Chambray-les-Tours, you'll be minutes from Pole Sante Leonard de Vinci. This hotel is within the vicinity of Stade de la Vallee du Cher and Parc des Expositions de Tours.

Rooms
Stay in one of 127 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Ibis Styles Tours sud - formerly Novotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and an elevator (lift). Planning an event in Chambray-les-Tours? This hotel has 2260 square feet (210 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Ibis Styles Tours sud - formerly Novotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pole Sante Leonard de Vinci - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Stade de la Vallee du Cher - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Parc des Expositions de Tours - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Botanical Garden - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Vinci International Convention Centre - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Francois Rabelais University - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Saint Martin Basilica - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Musee des Beaux-Arts - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Tours Cathedral - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Place Plumereau - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
St. Julien Church - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Musee du Gemmail - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Musee du Compagnonnage - 6.8 km / 4.3 mi
Prieure de St-Cosme - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Priory of Lavaray - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
Tours (XSH-Saint Pierre des Corps SNCF Train Station) - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Tours (TUF-Tours - Loire Valley) - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi

The preferred airport for Ibis Styles Tours sud - formerly Novotel is Tours (TUF-Tours - Loire Valley).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Novotel Tours Sud is Tours (TUF-Tours - Loire Valley) - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi.
